resources.string:
Lenovo K6 Power Full specs
5-inch Full HD (1920x1080p) IPS Display Snapdragon 430 processor coupled with Adreno 505 GPU 4GB RAM 32GB internal storage with MicroSD Card support up to 128GB 13MP Rear Camera, PDAF, LED Flash, 1080p Recording, Sony IMX258 sensor 8MP Front Camera Android 6.0.1 Marshmallow with Vibe UI 4000mAh Battery Fingerprint sensor, Metal Build, Dolby Atmos stereo speakers 4G with VoLTE, WiFi, Bluetooth 4.1, GPS, FM Radio
